title: IoT Commercial Drone and It’s Privacy and Security Issues
abstract: In today’s world, IoT technology is used vastly in different services. This Document is about IoT commercial Drone uses for Online Shopping.drone has advanced technology, camera and GPS to find out the destination point easily. Drones have been used for different kinds of applications like Social networking, Military Purpose, Medical or healthcare purpose and, home applications. Drones have some vulnerabilities so that the credentials can be attacked by the attackers. Those attackers can gather confidential information and misuse it. So it very dangerous when you are doing any monetary transactions and all. In this paper, we have discussed Online delivery using Drone which is combine with IoT technology and how can be secured from malicious attacks by hackers and can maintain Privacy on this.
venue: 2020 International Conference on Computer Science, Engineering and Applications (ICCSEA)

journal.name: 2020 International Conference on Computer Science, Engineering and Applications (ICCSEA)
